item.title: Khiri Travel reveals the hidden gems of Phuket
item.description:
Hidden Gems of Phuket: A Local’s Guide Have some free time during your Phuket business trip? Gonzalo Gil Lavedra, manager of Khiri Travel Thailand’s Phuket branch, suggests exploring the island’s lesser-known attractions and authentic experiences. “Discovering the quiet side of Phuket, away from the typical tourist spots, is what makes me appreciate calling this place home,” he shares. One such gem is the Gibbon Rehabilitation Centre within the Khao Phra Taeo forest reserve...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/khiri-travel-reveals-the-hidden-gems-of-phuket/
